item.description: Feel like getting some exercise? If the sun is shinning it will make a great day for a spring bike ride. The ride will start in Ayre and head out toward Nashua. I will go with the flow.... all the way to the end and back for a total of 22 miles or turning back early depending on the conditions and the timing. I drive a green Mitshibushi convertible, look for me in the parking lot shortly before 11! My cell is 9786213029 Patty
item.name: Nashua Ayre Rail Trail
